backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing contact submissions, with methods to submit, query, mark as read, and delete entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a team name correction involving the TeamSection component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend components and config files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes all site sections with header, footer, and toast notifications into the main app layout.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactForm: Validated contact form component that submits data via React Query and displays status feedback.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Ab: About section displaying mission, community, and approach value cards.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Co: Section wrapper for the contact form with heading and description.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/He: Hero section with headline, intro text, call-to-action buttons, and a hero image with smooth-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Pr: Displays three project cards with icons, descriptions, and tags describing the organization's programs.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Te: Renders a grid of team member cards showing names, roles, initials, and bios.
frontend/src/components/site/sections/Wh: Shows three core pillars with images and descriptions explaining the group's focus areas.
Footer with logo, quick links, social icons, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
Fixed header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines queries to fetch all or unread contact submissions using the actor.
Mutation hook to submit contact forms and invalidate submissions queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom color variables, dark mode values, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, container settings, shadows, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current state, schema version, feature definitions, and requirements for the INNO YOUTH website.
